buttoncontentgapspace.$description: This variable is in the SpaceScaling Collection. It was made to experiment with how scaling space could work across different content scaling / size / contrast themes.

buttonlabelfontsize.$description: This variable is in the SpaceScaling Collection. It was made to experiment with how scaling size could work across different content scaling / size / contrast themes. Font size across devices: 15 - 17 - 19

inputfieldlabelfontsize.$description: This variable is in the SpaceScaling Collection. It was made to experiment with how scaling size could work across different content scaling / size / contrast themes. Font size across scaling options: compact 15 - default 17 - spacious 19
